contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Okres povazska.png|thumb|right|300px|Location of [[Považská Bystrica District]] in the [[Trenčín Region]]]] '''Záskalie''' ({{lang-hu|Sziklahát}}) is a [[village]] and [[municipality]] in [[Považská Bystrica District]] in the [[Trenčín Region]] of north-western [[Slovakia]]. ==History== In [[history|historical records]] the [[village]] was first mentioned in 1379. ==Geography== The [[municipality]] lies at an [[altitude]] of 185 metres and covers an [[area]] of 2.388 km². It has a [[population]] of about 485 people. ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html {{Povazska Bystrica District}} {{coord|49|08|10|N|18|31|00|E|source:huwiki_region:SK_type:city|display=title}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Zaskalie}} [[Category:Villages and municipalities in Považská Bystrica District]] {{Trenčín-geo-stub}}
